full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BCOS MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI SKABS BZHI PA'I SPYI DON LEGS BSHAD RNAM 'BYED LUNG GI BANG MDZOD BLO GSAL YID 'PHROG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN ZHAD PA'I BLO GROS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @063A *, ,AOm SVA STI, DUG GSUMo 'DAM DU BYING BA'I LUS CAN RNAMS, ,THEG GSUM CHOS KYI KYOBS NYER DRANGS TE, ,SKU GSUMo GZHAL MED KHANG DU BKOD MDZAD PA, ,SRID GSUMo BLA MA SH'AKYA SENG GER 'DUD, RNAMo 'DREN MI PHAM MGON PO'I ZHAL LUNG LAS, ,RNAM RDZOGS SBYOR BA'I SKABS KYI GZHUNG GI DON, ,RNAMo MANG LUNG DANG RIGS PAS NYER BRGYAN TE, ,RNAMo PAR BKRAL BA LUNG GI BANG MDZOD 'DI, ,MDO SNGAGS SPYI DANG THA SNYAD GZHUNG KUN LA, ,PHYOGS RIS MED PAR SBYANGS PA'I SPOBS PA CAN, ,RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BYAMS PA 'OD LDAN GYIS, ,LHAG BSAM DAG PAS PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGES, ,RNAM MANG DU: KHAS MAN RA BA'I MKHA' KHYAB 'GRO, ,RNAMo 'DREN BYAMS MGON NYIN BYED MA 'ONGS DUS, ,RNAM BKRA THEG GSUM PADMO'I TSAL PHYE TSE, ,RNAMo GROL SBRANG RTZI RO YIS CHIM PAR SHOG ,TSUL 'DI DBYANGS CAN ZHAD PA'I BLO GROS GYI, ,MKHAS GRUB BYE BA'I BSTI GNAS BYAMS GLING DU, ,KHRA MA ZHES PA RAB YID SHING 'BRUG LOR, ,GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA DZA YANTU:,, MANGGA LAm,, ,,
